account.title: Account information
account.detailText: The basic information of the account is logged into the system

valid.fullNameMustNotBeNull: Full name must not be blank
valid.fullNameOverLength: Full name must not be greater than 250 characters
valid.phoneNumberMusNotBeEmpty: Phone number must not be blank
valid.phoneNumberDigits: Phone number should be between 8-25 numbers
valid.phoneNumberStartWithZero: The phone number must start with 0
valid.addressOverLength: The address must not be greater than 250 characters

note.title: Note:
note.passwordChangeNote1: Passwords must satisfy the following requirements
note.passwordChangeNote2: - Password must be at least 8 characters.
note.passwordChangeNote3: - Contain at least 1 number, 1 letter and 1 special character.
note.passwordChangeNote4: - Do not match the last 4 passwords.

valid.retypePasswordMustNotBeBlank: Password confirmation must not be blank

error.newPasswordExist: The password must not match with the 4 most recent password.

connectSocial.title: Link accounts
connectSocial.detailText: Information of the Facebook, Google and Apple accounts associated with your Sapo account support login by many methods.
connectSocial.detailTextMobile: Information of the Facebook, Google and Apple accounts associated with your Sapo account support login by many methods.

action.confirmRemoveSocialFacebook: Are you sure to unlink Facebook with your Sapo account. This action cannot be return.
action.confirmRemoveSocialGoogle: Are you sure to unlink Google with your Sapo account. This action cannot be return.
action.confirmRemoveSocialApple: Are you sure to unlink Apple with your Sapo account. This action cannot be return.
action.accountWithoutLinkFacebook: Your Sapo account is not linked to Facebook yet
action.accountWithoutLinkGoogle: Your Sapo account is not linked to Google yet
action.accountWithoutLinkApple: Your Sapo account is not linked to Apple yet

social.linkedOtherAccount: The account you choose is already linked to another Sapo account

notification.leavePage: Do you want to leave the page, all your edits will not be saved?

detail.description: Access and manage stores that are connected to your login account and sign up for try a new service.
detail.tryForFree: Sign up for a trial account
detail.cannotAccessToStore: Your account is not have the authority to access to any store
detail.tryForFreeLabel: Sign up for try to experience the service

error.notFound: This page could not be found.

detail.description: Thông tin về các Hợp đồng liên kết với tài khoản đang đăng nhập vào hệ thống
